participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, she is passionate about her studies and hopes to make a difference in the business world.
participant_1.background: My hands were always greasy from working on cars. I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon. I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby. I love to play soccer in the park because it is a great way to stay active and connect with my friends. Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, he values loyalty and enjoys building connections with a few close friends.
participant_2.background: I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life. I have been married for five years. I have been in the wedding planning business for four years now. I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them. I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.

content.text: Hey there! I'm glad to meet you.
Me too! What do you do for a living?
I've been in the wedding planning business for four years now. It's really rewarding and I love being able to help people plan their special day.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a wedding planner but I'm not sure I have the patience.
It does take a lot of patience, but it's so worth it when you see the bride and groom's faces on their wedding day.
I'm sure it is! I'm actually getting married next year so I may have to give you a call for some help.
Of course! I'd be happy to help.
You're welcome! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a student right now. I'm working on my master's degree in business administration.
Oh, that's great! What are you planning on doing with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going into the corporate world, but I'm also considering starting my own business.
Both of those sound like great options. I'm sure you'll do great with your degree.
Thank you! I appreciate your support.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to help.
